instructions.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
instructions.data: Wipe the surface with a rag soaked in paint thinner to remove grease, oil, wax and other foreign matter. For new galvanized surfaces: Etch the surface by applying 10% BOYSEN®® Metal Etching Solution B‑71 (Dilute 1 part of B‑71 to 9 parts water). Rinse with water and dry immediately. Note: Unpainted galvanized surfaces that have been exposed for 6 months or more need not be etched. However, formation of rust or corrosion should be treated prior to painting.

instructions.title: PAINTING SCHEDULE
NOTES
instructions.data: Use only BOYSEN®® Paint Thinner B‑0340 as thinning solvent for primer. BOYSEN®® Roofgard™ can be used as supplied. Immediately apply primer after recommended surface preparation to avoid occurrence of flash rusting.

calculator.title: Primer
calculator.item: BOYSEN®® Red Oxide Metal Primer B‑310
calculator.note: Alternative primers: BOYSEN®® Rust-Off™ B‑330, BOYSEN®® Epoxy Primer, BOYSEN®® Primeguard™
